API Reference¶

Data exploration¶

OSM extraction scrpt

data_exploration.osm_pbf_power_data_extractor.download_pbf(country_code, update)¶

TEST ONLY. FROM PYPSA. Initializes variables for power dispatch for a given component and a given attribute.

Parameters

  • n (pypsa.Network) –

  • c (str) – name of the network component

  • attr (str) – name of the attribute, e.g. ‘p’
